name: Monster Truck Racer: Highway X
description:
Monster Truck Racer: Highway Xmax!!!
Start with a monster van and work your way up to a monster jeep, monster pickup, and classic monster truck. All trucks are fully upgradeable, and there are 6 different locations to race in.
Features:

• High speed racing.
• Big jumps let players get big air.
• Complete front and back flips to earn extra money.
• High Definition graphics
• Simple and intuitive controls.
